Name: Maximum Fighterz: Direct Offensive Action
About the game: A new approach to the competitive fighting genre. FEATURES: -Balanced: Designed to be both fun and fair for both players. -Take on the tough A.I. opponent in the NEW Computer Battle mode! -Strategic: Use a variety of Strikes, Throws, and Counters to out predict and defeat your opponent. -Play Together However: Even with only one controller, there are convenient configuration settings for you to play against your friend/rival/random opponent, locally and online, no matter what. -Relaxing: Play at your own pace with turn-based combat. -Deep: Take notes and discover the hidden effects of your moves to surprise an unstudied opponent. -Easy to Learn: Access the fight tips or utilize training mode to read descriptions of each move in the game. -Awesome: Enjoy the optional quick-time event minigame to unleash the full power of your ultimate move. -Family Friendly: No explicit nor suggestive content, so you can focus on the action. Controller Support: Map your buttons from the configuration menu to select techniques during gameplay with a compatible controller.
